title: Font for a band. I'm sorry

author: jjoon

comments.content: I need your Help. It s a font used by a graphic designer for my band "John Doe". I have no information about him. Thank's

Your font is **[BIRTH OF A HERO](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110844/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=BIRTH%20OF%20A%20HERO%20-%20Regular&fid=f0d6bf7ff8d12d36597748bfdbe7d25e&fsize=60&text=JohnDoe&fit=1)** by Guillaume Séguin [2007, Free for personal use] which is actually a modified **[Avant Garde](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110844/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Apple%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Avant%20Garde%20Book%20-%20Regular&fid=69eebaf98ca5ff4b3d773d604a4bceba&fsize=60&text=JohnDoe&fit=1)**
